thread.title: Let Michelle Obama’s Thank You Notes Dull the Pain of Her Imminent Good-bye
thread.title_full: Let Michelle Obama’s Thank You Notes Dull the Pain of Her Imminent Good-bye

author: Karen Brill
title: Let Michelle Obama’s Thank You Notes Dull the Pain of Her Imminent Good-bye
text: She may not have the platform of a farewell address , but Michelle Obama isn’t saying good-bye to public life without making the rounds. The First Lady made her final appearance with the title on The Tonight Show on Wednesday, where she used the... More »
